name: Junk Drawer Starter Kit
description:
Ever looked over in envy at your friend's junk drawer? Were you in awe at how many packets of ketchup they had? Or were you blown away by the sheer number of instructional manuals for defunct appliances that they still kept? Sure, they make it look easy - but what if you want a classic, Midwestern junk drawer, but you just can't picture where to start?

Lucky for you, we've made a Junk Drawer Starter Kit, so you can get started on your own space full of horrors. Throw whatever you want into there - old tools, receipts, rubber bands - whatever! Feel the weird sting of guilt when you want to throw something out.

Controls

  • Click Escape to bring up a tab of all your categories of stuff!
  • Click the buttons to spawn stuff in your drawer.
  • Click and drag those objects to organize your drawer. Or not!
  • Feeling frisky? Right click an object to delete it. Don't worry, we won't tell your mom.

Lovingly stole the camera collider and click drag functions from pheonise's Unity Overlay Tool, again.
